events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's request has been categorized under the refund cluster based on their mention of a refund request.
Case assigned to agent Emily for handling the refund request regarding the recent jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket purchase. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed?
Sure, the order number is 589237. I have not used or washed the jacket, it is still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the smooth handling of the refund process.
The refund process has been successfully initiated and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience. Your feedback is valuable to us.
